# sdds-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                          | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | Disables the Link                    | `boolean` | `false` |
| `underline` | `underline` | Displays the Link with an underline. | `boolean` | `true`  |
